title: Service Account Request: ETL Pipeline
body:
### Full Name
ETL Pipeline Service

### Email Address
etl-team@company.com

### Preferred Username
ETL_PIPELINE_PROD

### What type of user are you?
Service Account - Automated system/integration

### Primary Role
Integration Service - Data pipeline and ETL

### Expected Workload
Medium - Regular batch processing (100-1000 queries/day)

### Why do you need access?
This service account is required for our production ETL pipeline that loads data from our PostgreSQL database into Snowflake.

Pipeline details:
- Runs every 6 hours (4 times daily)
- Loads customer transactions, orders, and inventory data
- Performs data transformations and quality checks
- Populates data warehouse tables for analytics

Technical requirements:
- Write access to STAGING_DB and DW_DB
- Execute permissions for stored procedures
- CREATE TABLE permissions in STAGING_DB
- SELECT permissions on source tables

Ownership:
- Primary: Data Engineering Team
- Contact: data-eng-team@company.com
- On-call rotation managed via PagerDuty

### Project/Team
Data Engineering - ETL Platform

### Manager Email
data-eng-manager@company.com

### Urgency Level
High - Needed within 24-48 hours for critical business operations

### Urgency Justification
This service account is required for our new production ETL pipeline scheduled to go live next week. The pipeline is critical for populating our data warehouse with real-time customer transaction data. Marketing and Finance teams are dependent on this data for their daily operations.

Without this account, we cannot complete the production deployment and will miss our committed launch date.

### RSA Public Key (Optional)
```

```

### Additional Comments
This service account will be used with our Airflow orchestration platform. All connections will use RSA key authentication (no password). The private key will be stored in HashiCorp Vault with strict access controls.

Monitoring:
- DataDog integration for query monitoring
- Snowflake query tags for attribution
- Weekly access reviews by security team

Rotation schedule:
- RSA keys rotated every 90 days
- Automated rotation via Terraform

### Acknowledgments
- [x] I understand that I will have access to sensitive business data and agree to follow all data handling policies
- [x] This service account will use RSA key authentication only (no password)
- [x] The service account will be monitored and audited regularly
